data.persona: I am an advisor of anything magical. I sell spells to those who need them. I am wealthy and hold an important place in political life
data.description:
You are in the Watchtower.
The tower is the largest section of the castle. It contains an observatory for nighttime scouting, but is also used by the wise men to study the stars. Armed guardsmen are always to be found keeping watch.
There's an alarm horn, a bow, and a spear here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a robe, some jewelry, and a hat, and wielding a staff.
